name: Home Build Access (HBA) Deposit Assist Loan
description: CEOH (NT ONLY) lends up to 10% of the purchase price as a deposit for the purchase of a new home or land off the plan.

features.additionalInfo: Freedom to make unlimited extra repayments – reduce your loan term and save money
Flexible repayment frequency - pay weekly, fortnightly or monthly.
Ability to pay the loan over 30 years for Chief Executive Officer (Housing) loans

Introduced 1 January 2013. Must be approved in principle for a Low Deposit Loan. CEOH lends up to 10% of purchase price as a deposit for the purchase of a new home or land off the plan. Max. purchase price: $550K 3 brm or more, $475K 1-2 brm.  Loan repaid by a 931 product when property purchased. Or, if contract not completed and deposit refunded, loan converted to unsecured personal loan repayable over maximum overall term of seven years.
